definition: to reach day after day for
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month
to arrive/to reach (esp. perfection)/utmost/(used in commercials)

sentences.english: The album represented a leap forward for the maturing singer.
sentences.chinese: 该专辑意味着这位日臻成熟的歌手向前迈进了一大步。

sentences.english: In recent years, Yueqing's infrastructure is improving daily.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，乐清的基础设施日臻完善。

sentences.english: From Xia to Qing Dynasty, the legal system became more and more systematic and perfect.
sentences.chinese: 由夏到清，惩赃法律制度日臻系统并完善。

sentences.english: Though Zidane is very quiet off the field, he steps up his performance.
sentences.chinese: 球场下齐达内沉默寡言，他的球技和日臻完美。

sentences.english: After unremitting restructuring and development, the province has improved its industrial system remarkably.
sentences.chinese: 经过持续不断的结构调整，全省产业体系日臻完善。

sentences.english: The environment of tourist industry has consummated .
sentences.chinese: 旅游业的环境日臻完美。

sentences.english: The function of investment promotion improves gradually and becomes more international.
sentences.chinese: 投资促进功能日臻完美，国际化日益凸起。

sentences.english: The application of ultra-high pressure in food industry in recent years gets ripen day by day.
sentences.chinese: 近年来超高压技术在食品工业中的应用日臻成熟。

sentences.english: What Nanchang university biology fastens is cold orchid test tube breeds a technology with respect to day attain matured.
sentences.chinese: 南昌大学生物系的寒兰试管培育技术就日臻成熟了。

sentences.english: Find the right storage solutions for your ever evolving digital world.
sentences.chinese: 为您日臻完美的数字世界寻找适合的存储解决方案。

sentences.english: The Emergency Management is becoming a mature subject in Western nations.
sentences.chinese: 公共安全管理在西方国家是一个日臻成熟的学科。

sentences.english: In the change day-by-day, the flesh is day by day perfect.
sentences.chinese: 在一天天的改变中，肌肤日臻完美。

definition: to attain perfection (idiom)
to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day/more (or better etc) with each passing day
(increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
to become more and more/to gradually become
day by day/more and more/increasingly/more and more with each passing day
every day sees new developments (idiom)/to make constant progress
excellent/top
all the more/even more/further
to arrive simultaneously
skillful/proficient
increasingly/more and more
all the more/increasingly
consummate/exquisite
incessant/relentless
needless to say/it goes without saying
to reach great heights (in technical skills or scholastic achievements)
